text: niṅṅaḷe bhūmiyil pratinidhikaḷākkiyat avanāṇ. āreṅkiluṁ aviśvasikkunnuveṅkil ā aviśvāsattinṟe dēāṣaṁ avanu tanneyāṇ. satyaniṣēdhikaḷkk avaruṭe satyaniṣēdhaṁ taṅṅaḷuṭe nāthanṟeyaṭutt avanṟe kēāpamallāteānnuṁ vardhippikkukayilla. satyaniṣēdhikaḷkk avaruṭe satyaniṣēdhaṁ naṣṭamallāteānnuṁ peruppikkukayilla
